definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Proper tuning is achieved by adjusting wooden rollers that are fitted under the rawhide verticals.
sentences.chinese: 適當調整是通過調整根據該生皮垂直安裝木製滾輪。

sentences.english: The present invention is useful in the preservation of hide quality of a wide variety of animals useful for tanning.
sentences.chinese: 本發明可使用於鞣製的各種動物生皮質量得以保護。

sentences.english: Its weight and thickness account for over 90% of raw hide.
sentences.chinese: 其重量或厚度約佔生皮的90%以上。

sentences.english: I also bound that ear limb connection with rawhide strips.
sentences.chinese: 我把耳和弓臂也用生皮綁在一起。

sentences.english: Our factory also has the ability to peel and dye the peltry .
sentences.chinese: 同時企業還備生皮削制及染色的能力。

definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
matsutake (Tricholoma matsutake), edible mushroom considered a great delicacy in Japan
hand-held mutton (mutton pieces on the bone, eaten with the fingers)
remnants of material from an industrial process/offcut/scraps
